purpose: To provide a centralized list of valuable resources, tutorials, and tools related to OR-Tools for optimization problems
principle: Collates and organizes community-contributed resources and tools related to OR-Tools, facilitating access to knowledge and best practices
reusability: Acts as a reference point for developers and researchers using OR-Tools, with links to various resources that can be integrated into their projects
limitations: Dependent on community contributions for updates and completeness; may not cover all available resources comprehensively
name: awesome_or-tools
description: A curated list of awesome OR-Tools community resources.
highlight: Comprehensive collection of OR-Tools resources curated by the community
